languages.text: На плитке едва заметен стершийся символ змия и звезды. За ней кто-то устроил тайник, но, судя по пыли, он давно заброшен.
You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.
languages.original_text: На плитке едва заметен стершийся символ змия и звезды. За ней кто-то устроил тайник, но, судя по пыли, он давно заброшен.

traits.locale_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

languages.text: Consigues identificar un símbolo descolorido en una de las baldosas: una serpiente y una estrella. Parece que alguien escondió algo debajo de ella, pero ya no queda nada.
languages.original_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

traits.locale_text: Consigues identificar un símbolo descolorido en una de las baldosas: una serpiente y una estrella. Parece que alguien escondió algo debajo de ella, pero ya no queda nada.

languages.text: タイルのひとつに、消えかけたシンボルが見える…蛇と星だ。その向こうに何者かの隠し部屋があるようだが、そこはとっくに手放されている。
languages.original_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

traits.locale_text: タイルのひとつに、消えかけたシンボルが見える…蛇と星だ。その向こうに何者かの隠し部屋があるようだが、そこはとっくに手放されている。

languages.text: 你在其中一块瓷砖上辨认出某个褪了色的符号，是一条巨蛇和一颗星星。瓷砖后面有个用来藏东西的地方，但看起来已经很久没人用过了。
languages.original_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

traits.locale_text: 你在其中一块瓷砖上辨认出某个褪了色的符号，是一条巨蛇和一颗星星。瓷砖后面有个用来藏东西的地方，但看起来已经很久没人用过了。

languages.text: Du erkennst schwach ein verblasstes Symbol auf einer der Kacheln — eine Schlange und ein Stern. Dahinter scheint ein Versteck zu liegen, das der Besitzer aber offenbar schon vor langer Zeit aufgegeben hat.
languages.original_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

traits.locale_text: Du erkennst schwach ein verblasstes Symbol auf einer der Kacheln — eine Schlange und ein Stern. Dahinter scheint ein Versteck zu liegen, das der Besitzer aber offenbar schon vor langer Zeit aufgegeben hat.

languages.text: Vous distinguez un symbole partiellement effacé, sur l'une des dalles : un serpent et une étoile. Apparemment, quelqu'un a caché quelque chose en dessous, mais la planque semble abandonnée depuis longtemps.
languages.original_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.

traits.locale_text: Vous distinguez un symbole partiellement effacé, sur l'une des dalles : un serpent et une étoile. Apparemment, quelqu'un a caché quelque chose en dessous, mais la planque semble abandonnée depuis longtemps.

languages.text: Karoların üzerindeki soluk bir simgeyi güç bela çıkarabiliyorsun. Bir yılan ve yıldız sembolü görüyorsun. Görünüşe göre ardında birinin zulası saklıymış ancak zula, çok uzun süre önce terk edilmiş.
languages.original_text: You can just make out a faded symbol on one of the tiles — a serpent and a star. There appears to be someone's stash behind it, but the stash has long been abandoned.
